title: Onnappola Oruthana Lyrics Vetrivel
stanzas:
Onnappola Oruthana
naan paarthathe illa
o osarampaathu
vaanam kooda
kurugume mella

saamipoola vanthavane
kekummunne thanthavane
naan vanagum nallavane
nalla ullam koondavane
yen ottumotham
jenmathukkum saami neethane

Onnappola Oruthana
naan paarthathe illa
o osarampaathu
vaanam kooda
kurugume mella (2)

unna ethirpaathu thaan
ennithayam vazhuthathoo
thannai ariyaamale
unnai athu sernthathoo

illai ini eethum endru
vaadi nindra poothile
muthumani theril ennai
eetri vantha vallale

oru vaarthaiyil
ennai uravaakinai
un uravenpathu
yuga yugangalai
kadanthathu thaane

Onnappola Oruthana
naan paarthathe illa
o osarampaathu
vaanam kooda
kurugume mella

unnudaiya saalaiyil
nindru malar thoovave
kannivaram ketkiren
nanum arangerave

unnarukil vazhvathondru
pothum intha mannile
veru ondrum thevai illai
yaavum unthan anbile

enna aalave vantha magaraasane
naan unnakkagave
pala piravigal
thunai varuvenai

Onnappola Oruthana
naan paarthathe illa
o osarampaathu
vaanam kooda
kurugume mella (2)

saamipoola vanthavane
kekummunne thanthavane
naan vanagum nallavane
nalla ullam koondavane
yen ottumotham
jenmathukkum saami neethane
